title: Expenditure of affluent U.S. households on fees for social , recreation , health club
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Amount spent in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 4.
Overall Amount spent in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Amount spent in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2013 to 2014, and finally slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Amount spent in U.S. dollars, about 56.15 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Amount spent in U.S. dollars, of value 46.58 was reported at Year 2013
